channel.title: Compiling Issue Please help me fix
channel.description:
[b]Hey guys so i'm trying to make my server and i tried compiling my changes and it didn't work it said it couldn't find the main class... My client compiler works and it looks like this:[/b]
[code]@echo off "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_23/bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/clientlibs.jar;lib/com.jar; -d bin src/*.java @pause [/code]
[b]Which compiles and works with no problems. However i tried copying and pasting this compiler into my server folder to replace the non-working one, and it didn't work... Here's my server non-working compiler code:[/b]
[code]@echo off title Phoenix-Pkz Compiler Made By James Color 81 echo Compiling Phoenix-Pkz cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src Dan\Desktop\Phoenix-PKz 317 - 659 Release!\Phoenix-PKz release\src\com\rs2hd\Main.java echo Correctly compiled Phoenix-Pkz pause[/code]
[b]It says javac isn't recognized and that it can't find main.java in the path, but i looked and it's in the correct location.. Any help would be much appreciated. Thanks.[/b]

item.title: Compiling Issue Please help me fix
item.dc:creator: @nolzan nolzan
item.description:
@nolzan wrote:

Hey guys so i’m trying to make my server and i tried compiling my changes and it didn’t work it said it couldn’t find the main class… My client compiler works and it looks like this:

@echo off "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_23/bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/clientlibs.jar;lib/com.jar; -d bin src/*.java @pause

Which compiles and works with no problems. However i tried copying and pasting this compiler into my server folder to replace the non-working one, and it didn’t work… Here’s my server non-working compiler code:

@echo off title Phoenix-Pkz Compiler Made By James Color 81 echo Compiling Phoenix-Pkz cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src Dan\Desktop\Phoenix-PKz 317 - 659 Release!\Phoenix-PKz release\src\com\rs2hd\Main.java echo Correctly compiled Phoenix-Pkz pause

It says javac isn’t recognized and that it can’t find main.java in the path, but i looked and it’s in the correct location… Any help would be much appreciated. Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Compiling Issue Please help me fix
